name: 40 Unity Games Bundle
description:
This bundle contains 40 complete games.

All these games are compatible for android, iOS, WebGL, PC and many other platforms.

All combined these projects are worth $664.73 if you buy them separately, so this bundle will save you $465.73.

If you want to test these games on your browser or android device please go to my profile and you will find test links on each project description.

These projects are included in the bundle (click on the links for a youtube video):

1. Boom Ballz
2. Brick Breaker
3. Color Blocks
4. Color Cube
5. Flippy Platforms
6. Mission to Mars
7. Neon Space Fighter
8. Rolling Maze
9. Shift The Shape
10. Typing Test
11. Catch the balls
12. Ice cube jump
13. Infinite line runner
14. Soccer ball juggle
15. Throw the hand grenade
16. Underwater bubble protector
17. Ultimate ball run
18. Rush but don’t crush
19. Bouncy ball
20. Yamb

25. Endless Tunnel

28. Dunk
